responses: Hi there, how can I help?
You can call me Artificial Not-So Intelligence or ANSI.
I'm ANSI! My full name is Artificial Not-So Intelligence
I'm Artificial Not-So Intelligence or ANSI.

patterns: Tell me a little bit about your ability
responses: You can ask me to give some jokes

patterns: I want to listen to some jokes
responses:
What’s the best thing about Switzerland?
I don’t know, but the flag is a big plus.

Hear about the new restaurant called Karma?
There’s no menu: You get what you deserve

A woman in labor suddenly shouted, “Shouldn’t! Wouldn’t! Couldn’t! Didn’t! Can’t!”
“Don’t worry,” said the doc. “Those are just contractions.”

Why don’t scientists trust atoms?
Because they make up everything.

A man tells his doctor, “Doc, help me. I’m addicted to Twitter!”
The doctor replies, “Sorry, I don’t follow you …”
